metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3253 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The MethodClosure class in runtime/MethodClosure.java in Apache Groovy1.7.0 through 2.4.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code orcause a denial of service via a crafted serialized object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

groovy - 2.4.15-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: groovy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.15-1ubuntu1').
